channel.title: Menus
channel.description: How do I add a menu and it opens with a command because I want to make a command menu with he command ::commands Idk if someone can copy the codes (I can change the text in the menu of course) out of their client.

item.title: Menus

@MoparRocksScape wrote:

Well, all I need to get is a menu maker…Im looking for it but if you find it first then thanks XD

item.title: Menus
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

took me 5 seconds(about, literally)

if(command.startsWith("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@commands menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@whi@Line 1", 8146); sendQuest("@whi@commands list woot!!", 8147); sendQuest("@whi@Admin Commands!", 8148); sendQuest("@whi@::notedbarrows", 8149); sendQuest("@whi@::banuser", 8150); sendQuest("@whi@::staff", 8151); sendQuest("@whi@::kick", 8152); sendQuest("@whi@::staff", 8153); sendQuest("@whi@::hunter", 8154); sendQuest("@whi@::openpits", 8155); sendQuest("@whi@::melee", 8156); sendQuest("@whi@::shutpits", 8157); sendQuest("@whi@::master", 8158); sendQuest("@whi@---------------------", 8159); sendQuest("@whi@player commands", 8160); sendQuest("@whi@---------------------", 8161); sendQuest("@whi@::inf", 8162); sendQuest("@whi@::pured", 8163); sendQuest("@whi@::jesus", 8164); sendQuest("@whi@::goldguy", 8165); sendQuest("@whi@::gilded", 8166); sendQuest("@whi@::why-blue-blkmystic", 8167); sendQuest("@whi@::ghostly", 8168); sendQuest("@whi@::starter", 8169); sendQuest("@whi@---------------------", 8170); sendQuest("@whi@teleport commands", 8171); sendQuest("@whi@---------------------", 8172); sendQuest("@whi@::jad", 8173); sendQuest("@whi@::magearena", 8174); sendQuest("@whi@::champs", 8175); sendQuest("@whi@::dragons", 8176); sendQuest("@whi@::vampires-only use if u got endar client", 8177); sendQuest("@whi@::pits", 8178); sendQuest("@whi@::saveme", 8179); sendQuest("@whi@::herosguild", 8180); sendQuest("@whi@::gopk", 8181); sendQuest("@whi@::duel", 8182); sendQuest("@whi@::pkmeplz", 8183); sendQuest("@whi@::willows", 8184); sendQuest("@whi@--------------", 8185); sendQuest("@whi@misc commands", 8186); sendQuest("@whi@--------------", 8187); sendQuest("@whi@::check-to see how many starter", 8188); sendQuest("@whi@kits u have had", 8189); sendQuest("@whi@so type ::starter now", 8190); sendQuest("@whi@--------------", 8191); sendQuest("@whi@menu commands", 8192); sendQuest("@whi@--------------", 8193); sendQuest("@whi@::skill-menu", 8194); sendQuest("@whi@::moneymaking", 8195); sendQuest("@whi@::pricelist", 8196); sendQuest("@whi@::commands", 8197); sendQuest("@whi@::heroshelp", 8198); sendQuest("@whi@thats all for now", 8199); sendQuest("@whi@more menus soon", 8200); sendQuest("@whi@have fun =)!", 82001); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
